All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Changeable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Debuggable, ptolemy.kernel.util.DebugListener, ptolemy.kernel.util.Derivable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Instantiable, ptolemy.kernel.util.ModelErrorHandler, ptolemy.kernel.util.MoMLExportable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Moveable, ptolemy.kernel.util.Nameable
public class RunTableau
extends Tableau
A tableau that creates a new run control panel for a ptolemy model. This panel has controls for parameters of the top-level entity and its director, if any, a set of buttons to control execution of the model, and a panel displaying the placeable entities within the model.
Since:
Ptolemy II 1.0
Version:
$Id: RunTableau.java 57046 2010-01-27 23:35:53Z cxh $
Author:
Steve Neuendorffer and Edward A. Lee
See Also:

  • Field Details

  • Constructor Details

    • RunTableau

      public RunTableau​(PtolemyEffigy container, java.lang.String name) throws ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException, ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException
      Create a new run control panel for the model with the given effigy. The tableau is itself an entity contained by the effigy and having the specified name. The frame is not made visible automatically. You must call show() to make it visible.
      Parameters:
      container - The containing effigy.
      name - The name of this tableau within the specified effigy.
      Throws:
      ptolemy.kernel.util.IllegalActionException - If the tableau is not acceptable to the specified container.
      ptolemy.kernel.util.NameDuplicationException - If the container already contains an entity with the specified name.
